content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Production Line at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing 14 iron plates

### Copper Production Line at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5) containing 2 copper ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing 21 copper plates

### Coal Production Line at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 203 coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Incomplete Power Infrastructure
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Disconnected pipe groups at:
  - (-13.5, 11.5) with 19 pipes
  - (-14.5, 19.5) with 10 pipes
  - (-9.5, 21.5) with 1 pipe

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Power Infrastructure Placement
- Avoid placing boilers where they overlap with water tiles
- Ensure there is enough clear space around water for the complete power setup (boiler + steam engine)
- When placing connected entities, ensure they are within reasonable distance of each other

### Errors with Entity Connections
- Make sure you have enough pipes in inventory before attempting to connect entities
- Place connected entities (like boiler and offshore pump) close enough to be connected with available pipes

### Errors with Entity Removal
- Verify entity exists at the target position before attempting to pick it up
- Use correct API calls for removing different types of entities (PipeGroup vs individual entities)

### Code/API Usage Errors
- Use correct class names when checking entity types (PipeGroup was undefined)
- Ensure all required classes and types are properly imported
